original_title: Bat like Devil Chaser with a Top Hat
overview: Culled from over 5,000 photographs by Jyoti Bhatt (b. 1934) from the collection of Bengaluruâ€™s Museum of Art and Photography, this short film pays respect to an artist whose body of work is a portrait of the Indian nation and offers a poetic visual and sonic journey across land and time.
title: Bat like Devil Chaser with a Top Hat
